Lyric:
[00:00.929]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[00:05.050]
[00:05.930]Everybody come take my hand I guess
[00:10.830]We'll walk this road together' through the storm
[00:14.509]Whatever weather' cold or warm
[00:18.200]Just let you know that' you're not alone
[00:19.840]Hola if you feel that you've been down the same road
[00:22.919]You can try and read my lyrics off of this paper before I lay 'em
[00:26.180]But you won't take this thing out these words before I say 'em
[00:29.140]Cause ain't no way I'm let you stop me from causing mayhem
[00:31.559]When I say 'em or do something I do it' I don't give a damn
[00:34.560]What you think' I'm doing this for me' so fuck the world
[00:37.150]Feed it beans' it's gassed up' if a thing's stopping me
[00:39.990]I'mma be what I set out to be' without a doubt undoubtedly
[00:42.870]And all those who look down on me I'm tearing down your balcony
[00:45.960]No if ands or buts don't try to ask him why or how can he
[00:48.580]From Infinite down to the last Relapse album he's still shit and
[00:51.890]Whether he's on salary' paid hourly
[00:54.140]Until he bows out or he shit's his bowels out of him
[00:56.960]Whichever comes first' for better or worse
[00:58.890]He's married to the game' like a fuck you for christmas
[01:01.960]His gift is a curse' forget the earth he's got the urge
[01:04.519]To pull his dick from the dirt and fuck the universe
[01:07.190]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[01:11.620]
[01:12.810]Everybody come take my hand
[01:17.060]
[01:18.500]We'll walk this road together' through the storm
[01:21.400]Whatever weather' cold or warm
[01:24.070]Just let you know that' you're not alone
[01:26.950]Holla if you feel that you've been down the same road
[01:30.500]Ok quit playin' with the scissors and shit' and cut the crap
[01:32.940]I shouldn't have to rhyme these words in the rhythm for you to know it's a rap
[01:36.200]You said you was king' you lied through your teeth
[01:38.130]For that fuck your feelings' instead of getting crowned you're getting capped
[01:41.220]And to the fans' I'll never let you down again' I'm back
[01:44.130]I promise to never go back on that promise' in fact
[01:46.880]Let's be honest' that last Relapse CD was "ehhhh"
[01:49.600]Perhaps I ran them accents into the ground
[01:52.220]Relax' I ain't going back to that now
[01:54.989]All I'm tryna say is get back' click-clack BLAOW
[01:57.610]Cause I ain't playin' around
[01:59.070]There's a game called circle and I don't know how
[02:01.460]I'm way too up to back down
[02:03.600]But I think I'm still tryna figure this crap out
[02:06.300]Thought I had it mapped out but I guess I didn't
[02:08.659]This fucking black cloud's still follow's me around
[02:11.599]But it's time to exercise these demons
[02:12.909]These motherfuckers are doing jumping jacks now!
[02:15.099]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[02:19.870]Everybody come take my hand
[02:24.459]
[02:25.199]We'll walk this road together' through the storm
[02:28.599]Whatever weather' cold or warm
[02:31.028]Just let you know that' you're not alone
[02:33.849]Holla if you feel that you've been down the same road
[02:38.199]
[02:39.000]And I just can't keep living this way
[02:42.490]So starting today' I'm breaking out of this cage
[02:48.299]I'm standing up' Imma face my demons
[02:50.579]I'm manning up' Imma hold my ground
[02:54.190]I've had enough' now I'm so fed up
[02:56.199]Time to put my life back together right now
[02:58.829]It was my decision to get clean' I did it for me
[03:02.259]Admittedly i probably did it subliminally for you
[03:05.419]So I could come back a brand new me' you helped see me through
[03:08.299]And don't even realise what you did' believe me you
[03:11.099]I been through the ringer' but they can do little to the middle finger
[03:14.259]I think I got a tear in my eye' I feel like the king of
[03:17.790]My world' haters can make like bees with no stingers' and drop dead
[03:20.129]No more beef flingers' no more drama from now on' I promise
[03:23.490]To focus soley on handling my responsibility's as a father
[03:26.289]So I solemnly swear to always treat this roof like my daughters and raise it
[03:30.009]You couldn't lift a single shingle lonely
[03:32.949]Cause the way I feel' I'm strong enough to go to the club
[03:35.949]Put a ??? and lift the whole liquor counter up
[03:39.090]Cause I'm raising the bar' I shoot for the moon
[03:40.879]But I'm too busy gazing at stars' I feel amazing and
[03:43.590]I'm not afraid to take a stand
[03:48.949]Everybody come take my hand
[03:54.509]We'll walk this road together' through the storm
